channel.title: Videos: R.I.P The Old Nite and R.I.P Aryan
channel.description:
Well me and a friend made two videos one of The Old Nite and how he died and one of how Aryan got taken down by Jagex.
You can find them by going here http://www.freewebs.com/peiwei/ clicking on Wei Videos then your there.

item.title: Videos: R.I.P The Old Nite and R.I.P Aryan
item.dc:creator: @David David
item.description:
@David wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:8, topic:5037”][quote author=David link=topic=6578.msg67032#msg67032 date=1153002925]

It’s pronounce Arian like… Hitler’s Arian Race.

I’ll check out the videos though.

The Aryan race wasn’t made by hitler, it dates waaaay back.

Also, the video’s were good. The music and the way they were put forward.
[/quote]
I said Hitler’s Aryan race. That means Hitler’s VERSION of the Aryan race and that’s going off topic anyways. Thank you for trying to correct me.

I just saw the first video and I couldn’t hear a word you were saying cause of the music, so I killed it and the other one about the Old Nite… idk I kind of just got bored. I was sorry he died, but it was like one of those things, umm didn’t know him, so didn’t really feel that bad. :rolleyes: oh well. Too bad he died though, from whatpeople say, he sounds nice. :)[/quote]

Aryan just means pure. 'Nuf said.

When I used to play runescape (>.<)! I actually met him. I was like a level 40 member, so I was a noob.

I spoke to him; asked him if he could protect me from zezima (Old nite was no.2 at the time).

He just said “Lol, you’re funny”.

Then I followed him for ages…

AND THAT’S MY LIFE UPTO NOW.

Read full topic

It’s pronounce Arian like… Hitler’s Arian Race.

I’ll check out the videos though.
[/quote]

The Aryan race wasn’t made by hitler, it dates waaaay back.

Also, the video’s were good. The music and the way they were put forward.[/quote]
I said Hitler’s Aryan race. That means Hitler’s VERSION of the Aryan race and that’s going off topic anyways. Thank you for trying to correct me.

I just saw the first video and I couldn’t hear a word you were saying cause of the music, so I killed it and the other one about the Old Nite… idk I kind of just got bored. I was sorry he died, but it was like one of those things, umm didn’t know him, so didn’t really feel that bad. :rolleyes: oh well. Too bad he died though, from whatpeople say, he sounds nice.
